 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתַק‎</span>] **verb** ==be quiet== (late) (Late Hebrew ***id., be silent***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁתַק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵיק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be quiet, silent*** (compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁקט‎</span>)); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular, of sea <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁתֹּק הַיָּם‎</span> [[Jonah.1.11|Jonah 1:11]]; [[Jonah.1.12|Jonah 1:12]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>), of quarrel, strife [[Prov.26.30|Prov 26:30]] 3 masculine plural of persons at sea, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁתֹּ֑קוּ‎</span> [[Ps.107.30|Ps 107:30]].
